```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
Add data for 2012 and 2013
```{r}
library(readxl)
unemployment <- read_excel("~/Desktop/cr-data/unemployment/raw_data/Unemployment.xlsx")
unemployment$diff <- (unemployment$`2014` - unemployment$`2011`)/3
unemployment$`2012` <- round(unemployment$`2011`+ unemployment$diff,2)
unemployment$`2013` <- round(unemployment$`2012` + unemployment$diff,2)
unemployment <- unemployment[,-16]
unemployment <- unemployment[,c(1,2,15,14,13,12,11,10,16,17,9,8,7,6,5,4,3)]
```
Wide to long
```{r}
library(tidyr)
unemployment_long <- gather(unemployment, year, unemployment, `2006`:`2020`, factor_key = T )
unemployment_long <- unemployment_long[order(unemployment_long$municipality_id, unemployment_long$year), ]
```
Save data
```{r}
write.csv(unemployment_long, "~/Desktop/cr-data/unemployment/raw_data/Unemployment_long.csv", row.names=FALSE)

```
